detail_desc: Oversized shirt in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, covered buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pockets and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Trousers in striped organic cotton bonded jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Socks knitted in chenille with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in thin cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves.
Body in glossy jersey with a draped neckline at the back, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Jacket in cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Collar, zip and wind flap down the front, and chest and front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Buttoned cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton slub jersey with a flounced seam at the top and short, wide, broderie anglaise sleeves.
Two pairs of leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with bow appliqués at the hems.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Lined. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 12 cm.
Printed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fluffy yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shaping bikers in microfibre. High waist with a laser-cut edge and short legs with lace-trimmed hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Sleeveless, fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Double-breasted coat in an Italian wool blend with large, wide notch lapels, concealed press-studs at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. One inner pocket with a button, and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with a metal decoration at the front and an elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back. Width 2 cm.

All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a wool blend with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button and a loose yoke at the back and partly at the front with a button. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, a tab and buckle at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Boxy jumper in a jacquard knit containing some wool. Ribbed, roll-edge polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.

Long jumpsuit in satin with an open back and button at the back of the neck, wide sleeves, seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and concealed zip at the back. Side pockets and wide tapered legs. Unlined.
Skater skirt in a fine knit with terry appliqués and an elasticated waist.

Cold shoulder blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered flounce at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Jersey lining.

Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with notch lapels and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Microfibre vest top with folded, glued edges at the top and a laser-cut hem for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Short skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and a sewn-in wrapover at the front with wide ties at one side. Flounced trim down the front and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a bouclé knit with a roll-edge neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Double-layered hat in soft, rib-knit cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.

Set with a top and pair of puff pants in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trim at the hem. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and a frill trim around the hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back made up of narrow, crossover straps and an elastic hem. Extra firm support.
Alice band covered with patterned fabric with a large, decorative bow at the top.
Fully lined printed bikini. Top with frilled narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the front.
Striped shorts in a soft linen and cotton blend with an elasticated paper bag waist and decorative tie detail with glittery tassels.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. The underwiring is V-shaped at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Triangle bikini top with decorative straps at the hem, lined cups, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastening at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in cotton twill with buttons down the front and fake welt pockets at the top.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jacket and pair of shorts woven in an airy linen blend. Jacket with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and welt side pockets with a flap. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Detachable, elastic D-ring belt.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Chukka boots in suede with rounded, reinforced toe caps, lacing with speed hooks at the top, striped linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in sturdy cotton twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, patch front pockets, a back pocket and gently tapered legs.
Hat in paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with buttons down the front and a high waist with partially stitched pleats down the front. Two slits at the front and one at the back. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft with a visible felted lining at the top and lacing at the front. Zip in one side, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Felted linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Thin metal rings in various designs.

Large shopper in soft suede with wide handles at the top in leather with decorative metal studs. Wide, detachable shoulder strap in woven fabric with a sheen, attached with metal carabiner hooks. Metal fastener at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Size 16x34x40 cm.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with long dolman sleeves and a low-cut back with crossover straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Set with a top and shorts in cotton. Patterned jersey top. 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
